title: WASI 0.2: Unlocking WebAssembly’s Promise Outside the Browser
author: Tyler McMullen; Luke Wagner
description: WASI 0.2 symbolizes the culmination of years of collaborative effort and innovation, paving the way for a new era of cross-platform development and deployment.
cntitle: WASI 0.2：在浏览器之外释放 WebAssembly 的潜力
cndescription: WASI 0.2 标志着多年协作努力和创新的结晶，为跨平台开发和部署的新时代铺平了道路。
